text: Jerald B. Harkness (May 7, 1940 â€“ August 24, 2021) was an American professional basketball player. He played for the New York Knicks of the National Basketball Association (NBA) and the Indiana Pacers of the American Basketball Association (ABA). Harkness also played for the Loyola of Chicago, where he won the 1963 NCAA Title. He was born in Harlem, New York. Harkness died on August 24, 2021 at age 81. ==References== Category:1940 births Category:2021 deaths Category:New York Knicks players Category:Indiana Pacers players Category:Sportspeople from New York City Category:Sportspeople from Chicago Category:American civil rights activists
title: Jerry Harkness
